A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved the story and how unexpected each plot twist was. The audience cheered at the awesome action moments\, and laughed at the generally well crafted comedy. I did not like the Rey and Kylo interactions\, and felt the characters\, old and new\, were not lovable like in ep 7 or Rogue One\, hence the 4 stars. But beyond that\, I liked the new characters they introduced and am really looking forward to the sequel.
